You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 1
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 1

segments.pli: 21. Paṭhamavagga
segments.en: 21. First

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as permanent. That is not possible.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as permanent. That is possible.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as pleasant.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as pleasant.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take anything as self.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take something as self.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder their mother.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder their mother.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder their father.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder their father.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder a perfected one.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder a perfected one.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to injure a Realized One with malicious intent.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to injure a Realized One with malicious intent.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano saṅghaṃ bhindeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to acknowledge another teacher.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to acknowledge another teacher.”

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for two perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas to arise in the same solar system at the same time.

segments.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā ekova arahaṃ sammāsambuddho uppajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
segments.en: But it is possible for just one perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, to arise in one solar system.”

segments.pli: Vaggo paṭhamo.
